entry.title: Stuck In the Middle
entry.summary:
Author: buckdiaztruther (Izquierd)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,042Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "So what do we do tomorrow on shift when Eddie asks how the date went?" asks Val "We tell him 'Hey, we tried but we're better off as friends'," Answers Buck matter-of-factly. "Boo!" she jeers whilst throwing the stale bar pretzels at him. "Thats lame, why don't we... pretend we're dating?" "Why would we do that?" "To make Eddie jealous!" States Val with a michevious grin. "Which will, never in a million years work." Buck has considered the possibility of Eddie loving him back, he's had the fantasies, but that's all they will ever amount to, fantasies. "What's the harm in trying? Look, if it doesn't work, then I go back to the 112, we go our separate ways, tell him we're better off as friends. If it does work? You'll finally get your hunky firefighter and live happily ever after! Either way, no downside." Buck hums in agreement, ruminating on the idea. Shes not wrong, its not exactly a win-win situation, more like win-neutral; but theres no loss really! Perhaps the 3 beers and 2 vodka tonics have impacted his decision-making more than he thought. "Fuck it" OR Buck fake dates another firefighter, Eddie goes crazy

entry.title: The Christmas Wish A Ryliver Special
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,857Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 6

Summary: Oliver Leon Jones grows up in London and joins the UK acting union. He registers professionally as Oliver Jones. His career moves forward. His personal life stalls. Dating feels empty. He wants a partner who understands him. On Christmas Day 2017, he makes a quiet wish for a best friend who feels right. His manager laughs. Life moves on. A new job changes his path. Oliver joins 9-1-1, created by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, and Tim Minear. On his first day on set, he meets Ryan Anthony Guzman. The connection hits fast. Ryan brings confidence, warmth, and familiarity Oliver has missed for years. The story follows Oliver as work blurs into something personal. Friendship grows under studio lights and long days. Attraction builds behind closed doors. A Christmas wish turns real, with joy, risk, and consequences Oliver never planned for.

entry.summary:
Author: PhantomGlow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,209Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: Eddie Diaz has spent years hiding a truth about himself he‚Äôs barely admitted even in the dark. He‚Äôs a great dad, a solid firefighter, a good man. But he‚Äôs not straight and saying that out loud feels impossible. This is Eddie‚Äôs story the fear, the almosts, the breakdowns, and the slow, messy journey toward finally being honest with himself and the people he loves most. It‚Äôs about found family, quiet courage, and realizing the love you‚Äôre terrified of might already be waiting for you.

entry.title: Catch Me, Please
entry.summary:
Author: ALittleSideProject

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,497Chapters: 2/34Kudos: 13

Summary: And all of that was why, on their seventeenth day on Mars, Buck had shoved Eddie out of the way during the emergency evacuation, knowing it meant his own death instead of Eddie‚Äôs. Buck trusted Eddie to help get everyone else home, and Eddie had someone to go home for. Someone who needed him and loved him. Someone who Buck loved, even without ever meeting. He wasn‚Äôt going to let Chris grow up without a father. So in the split second he had to think after seeing the communications dish flying at them through the storm that was chasing them off the planet fourteen days early, he‚Äôd pushed Eddie out of the way, hoping like hell it would be enough and knowing he wouldn‚Äôt live long enough to find out.--Or, take the basic plot of The Martian and stick the 911 characters in there, slap on a lot more angst and pining, and wrap it all up with plenty of recovery cuddling.

entry.title: one single glimpse of relief
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,950Chapters: 3/20Kudos: 19

Summary: "What if I never get better? What if I always feel like this?" Buck finally looks back up at him, vulnerability and compassion clear on his too-expressive face. "I don't know," he says honestly. "I don't‚Ä¶" he shudders, gives a tiny shrug of his shoulders and tries again. "I don't have an answer for that, man. It's been seven months for me and I still feel‚Ä¶like this." "Like what?" Buck just shrugs again, then mumbles, "Not myself." And Eddie doesn't know what to say to that either, because this is the only version of Buck he's ever known.Or: Buck and Eddie meet at grief group.

entry.title: Terrible Things
entry.summary:
Author: Cheerios_me_lovely

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,510Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 67

Summary: "I was about to bare my heart out to you, ask you to plan a future with me, and now you're telling me you're not making it to next Christmas?! I mean..." Eddie ran his hands through his hair, appearing slightly deranged as he did. Manic. Buck stopped breathing, at his words. "And Tilly, Tilly needs her Dad. You're not going to die any time soon. You can't leave her, leave us. Got it?" Or: To Buck, the most terrifying part about being diagnosed with stage three cancer was the thought of leaving his daughter alone. So, to prepare his family for the worst, Buck teaches Eddie how to be a father to his little girl. Turns out, Eddie didn't need to learn how to love Tilly and Buck like his own. He'd been there for a long time.

entry.title: Superstar and the Heartthrob
entry.summary:
Author: Baileyloves911

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,424Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 26

Summary: Before Eddie could respond the bell over the door jingled. And the entire place seemed to hold its breath. He didn‚Äôt even need to turn around the sound of frantic camera shutters outside muffled by the door said enough. But when he did turn, his brain short circuited. Buck Buckley walked in like a movie scene hoodie up, cap low with his eyes bright even under the dim lights. The crowd went quiet in that surreal way that only happened when someone too famous entered a room not built for them. ¬† He shut the door quickly while pressing his back against it as a few paparazzi flashes went off through the glass. ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù he muttered while exhaling. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre like vultures‚Äù Eddie blinked, and speechless for half a second before his body moved on instinct. ‚ÄúHey, uh here‚Äù He got up whole crossing the room. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a side door in the back, if you wanna-‚Äú Buck looked up and that was it.The eye contact hit like static. Or: What if Buck is a famous popstar and Eddie is a model and actor in an alternate universe?
